**Izinin Amfani daga:** \\
\\
Wannan aiki, ya yiyu tauren tsarin "Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).

Ana iya:

* **Rabawa** — koikoiyo da rabawa aikin cikin kowanne kamani

* **Daidaitawa** — Ka iya sakewa canzawa ko ƙarawa kamar yarda ka so har ma don saidawa.

Bisa waɗannan ka'idodi :

* **Bajinta ** — Dole ku bajintar da wannan aiki kamar haka: "Aikin farin ana samun shi a http://openbiblestories.com." Rubutacciyar Bajintar cikin wasu panni ba sa bari da cewa muna goyin bayanku ko muna amfani da wannan aiki.\\
\\
* **ShareAlike** — Idan ka haɗa, ka canza ko ƙara bisa aikin, sai kai rarraba gudummawarka bisa ka'ioddin lisans kamar lisans kin ta farko.

Amfanin tambarori:   **unfoldingWord ** Tambari ne na Distant Shores Media da ba za a haɗa shi ba da wani aikin shigin wannan.   Aikin mara aibi daga  http://openbiblestories.com dole ne a sa shi cikin alamar **unfoldingWord** lokacin da ake rarraba shi ga waɗansu.  Amma, idan kun ɓata aikin ta wani hali, sai ku fida alamar kafin ku rarraba aikinka.

Ga ƴan uwa maza da mata cikin Kiristi ko'ina cikin duniya--ekklisiyar gaba ɗaya:  Addu'armu ce Allah ya yi aiki da waɗannan abu gani na Maganarsa ya sa albarka.
